description: The maximum rate of substance administration. For volume medications, the maximum rate is to be expressed as a volume per time period. This value may be used as a stopping condition when a deliveryRateIncrement is specified without a count.

element.definition: The maximum rate of substance administration. For volume medications, the maximum rate is to be expressed as a volume per time period. This value may be used as a stopping condition when a deliveryRateIncrement is specified without a count.
